# ContractRoles class

Handle contract permissions

## Example

```javascript
const contract = await sdk.getContract("{{contract_address}}");
const rolesAndMembers = await contract.roles.getAll();
await contract.roles.grantRole("admin", "0x...");
```

## Constructors

| Constructor                                                                   | Modifiers | Description                                                       |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [(constructor)(contractWrapper, roles)](./sdk.contractroles._constructor_.md) |           | Constructs a new instance of the <code>ContractRoles</code> class |

| ------------------------------------------------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------ |
| [featureName](./sdk.contractroles.featurename.md) |           | "Permissions"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                  |
| [grant](./sdk.contractroles.grant.md)             |           | { (role: TRole, address: string): Promise&lt;Omit&lt;{ receipt: import("@ethersproject/abstract-provider").TransactionReceipt; data: () =&gt; Promise&lt;unknown&gt;; }, "data"&gt;&gt;; prepare: (role: TRole, address: string) =&gt; Promise&lt;[Transaction](./sdk.transaction.md)&lt;Omit&lt;{ receipt: import("@ethersproject/abstract-provider").TransactionReceipt; data: () =&gt; Promise&lt;unknown&gt;; }, "data"&gt;&gt;&gt;; }                                                                                       | Grant a role to a specific address               |

| [setAll](./sdk.contractroles.setall.md)           |           | { (rolesWithAddresses: { \[key in TRole\]?: string\[\] &#124; undefined; }): Promise&lt;Omit&lt;{ receipt: import("@ethersproject/abstract-provider").TransactionReceipt; data: () =&gt; Promise&lt;unknown&gt;; }, "data"&gt;&gt;; prepare: (rolesWithAddresses: { \[key in TRole\]?: string\[\] &#124; undefined; }) =&gt; Promise&lt;[Transaction](./sdk.transaction.md)&lt;Omit&lt;{ receipt: import("@ethersproject/abstract-provider").TransactionReceipt; data: () =&gt; Promise&lt;unknown&gt;; }, "data"&gt;&gt;&gt;; } | Overwrite the list of members for specific roles |

## Methods

| Method                                    | Modifiers | Description                        |
| ----------------------------------------- | --------- | ---------------------------------- |
| [get(role)](./sdk.contractroles.get.md)   |           | Get all members of a specific role |
| [getAll()](./sdk.contractroles.getall.md) |           | Get all members of all roles       |

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ContractRoles<TContract extends IPermissions, TRole extends Role> implements DetectableFeature
```

**Implements:** DetectableFeature

## Remarks

Configure roles and permissions for a contract, to restrict certain actions.
